pages.text: $(br)Storing:$(br2) - While you store, it allows you to store your heat, making you less vulnerable to heat sources.$(br2) - Be careful to use it in cold places.
$(br2)$(br2)$(br2)Tapping:$(br2) - As you decant, you expel heat, causing you to set other entities on fire on hit.$(br2) - Comforting against that cold powder snow.
